title: Syntax Error
description: A look at different Syntax Errors.

questions.question: let str = 'This is a string with a syntax error;
questions.explanation: Syntax errors are very common but also very obvious. The string in this question is missing a closing quotation mark.

questions.question:
let num = 10; 
let x = num.toFixed(2;
questions.explanation: The method .toFixed is missing a closing parentheses.

questions.question: console.log(variable);
questions.explanation: Here, we are trying to reference a variable that has not been declared. Therefore, this code will throw a Reference Error.
